hmm..unfortunatly this morning I went mad I decided to uninstall a lot of the 
JREs that I had on my system I had 1.2.2, 1.3, 1.4.1_2 ,1.4.2 I know for sure 
that I was using one of the IBM  1.4.x.. I can't say which one specificly 
sorry. I tend to change JREs very frequently... but yesterday and the whole 
last week I have been running with a flavour of 1.4.x

The class Modifier is in the same package as ASTConverter. It should have no 
problem finding it. You have either:
1. a corrupt build 
2. a VM with a bug
3. discovered a bug in the Eclipse class loader

To help us finding out the cause of the problem, we would need these 
information:
- the Eclipse build number
- the VM version
- exact steps to reproduce the problem
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 67969 ***
